pageTitle: Send an SR1 form - Send an SR1 - GOV.UK
notificationText: Find out about the changes to the Special Rules process (opens in a new tab) in the benefit system.
insetText: You can now use the redesigned SR1 form and give us your feedback. Access the new service now
p1: Use this service to tell the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) that you have a patient who:
li2: you would not be surprised if they were to live for less than 12 months
